definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wander, journey, go (Ph. [[ארךְ]] in [[מארח]], prob. = [[מְאָרֵחַ]] cf. Eth. marh.a: lead, conduct, v. Nö:ZMG 1888, 472; epithet of god Eshmun, Sab. [[ארחַ]] DHM:Epigr. Denkm. p. 70, Aram. [[אוֹרֵחַ]], 0orh.o0 traveller)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְאָרַה]] consec. Jb Job 34:8; Pt. [[אׂרֵחַ]] Ju Jdg 19:17 +; pl. [[אׂרְהִים]] Je 9:1; —
journey, go, c. [[עִם]] fig. of association, companionship Job 34:8 :[[לְחֶבְרָה עִם־פּׂעֲלֵי אָאָוֶן וְלָלָכֶת עִם־אַנְשֵׁי־רֶֽשַׁע]] ´[[וְא]] (cf. also [[הלך]] Ps 1:1).

Pt. wandering, wayfaring, journeying, [[הָאִישׁ הָאׂרֵחַ]] Ju Jdg 19:17; as subst. wanderer, wayfarer, traveller [[אׂרֵחַ]] 2Sa 12:4 (‖[[הֵלָךְ]]), Je 14:8 (‖[[גֵּר]], in sim. of ´[[י]]); [[מְלוֹן אׂרְחִים]] wayfarers' lodging-place Je 9:1.
